uvi.description:
isdn: cpai: check ctr->cnr to avoid array index out of bound

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.76 by commit 7f221ccbee4ec662e2292d490a43ce6c314c4594. For more details please see the references link.
